title: OnPage Corporation Closes Record Quarter
text: OnPage Corporation Closes Record Quarter OnPage IT Alert Management Software OnPage IT Alert Management Software Download the OnPage FREE TRIAL Today! The Latest OnPage Software Release Spurs 218% Growth and Adoption by Major Clients Incluiding HCA, Land Rover, Wheaton Franciscan Healthcare, and SourceGas. Q3 2015 has been a banner quarter for OnPage”, said CEO Judit Sharon. “We closed a record number of new clients, saw increased adoption by existing clients, & released major new product capabilities. — Judit Sharon WALTHAM, MA, UNITED STATES, October 19,   OnPage Corporation , a worldwide leader in Secure Priority Messaging for Medical and IT, announced today that the company had record results for the 3rd quarter of Fiscal 2015, continuing the momentum of the first half of the year. “Q3 2015 has been a banner quarter for OnPage Corporation”, said CEO Judit Sharon. “We closed a record number of new customers, saw increased adoption by existing clients, expanded our Management team with experienced leadership, and released major new product capabilities that were well received by the market.” 3rd Quarter bookings were up 218% over the previous quarter, and 60% year over year. During the quarter OnPage released powerful new scheduling, escalation and fail over capabilities to its flagship Enterprise product . The company officially changed its name from Onset Technology to OnPage Corporation to reflect its commitment to its latest product OnPage. To accelerate adoption in the IT and MSP markets the company hired Roger Hodskins, a 33 year industry veteran who most recently ran WW Channels & Alliances at Kaseya. “I am delighted with how well OnPage is being received across multiple verticals.” Commented Roger. “Our enhanced feature set combined with the industry’s easiest integration interface has allowed our clients to realize the benefits of OnPage Intelligent Roundtrip Messaging™ more rapidly and at a lower cost than other solutions. Last quarter we kicked off several strategic partner initiatives that will be showcased in Q4 and continue our expansion.” About OnPage: OnPage is the industry leading Smartphone application system for Global, High-Priority, Real-Time Enterprise Messaging, Cybersecurity Intrusion Compliance and IT Alert Management . The OnPage application addresses the need for critical incident response management and secure time-sensitive messages. OnPage takes mobile communications to the next level with the latest all-in-one-app features, including the ability to set priority level for each message to ensure the High-Priority messages receive immediate attention. Additionally, the new web based On-Call scheduling management tool enables enterprise users to plan ahead and route prioritized messages to the right person, on the right day, at the right time. Thousands of IT Professionals, healthcare providers, doctors, field engineers, law enforcement, nurses, emergency responders and disaster recovery teams depend on OnPage rock solid reliability every day. Leading corporations, including Blue Chip organizations have adopted OnPage for critical alerts and secure messaging. For more information visit: www.OnPage.com Joe Angrisano
